html: Hi Kevin! There's no achievement on Android yet, only on the PC version. As for levels validation, it's been a bit delayed with holidays and stuff, but feel assured it will be checked in time. Thanks for your patience!

html: On #indiedevhour we've reached 200 followers! Thank you guys for following us! We'll announce the Steam key winner tomorrow!

html: Then you should do a higher export. Just my opinion of course :D

html: I'm using simple vector tool Pixelmator, and results are PNG format. Thank you for your advice.
text: I'm using simple vector tool Pixelmator, and results are PNG format. Thank you for your advice.

html: You should work with vectorised icons, they look a bit too pixelated to me.
text: You should work with vectorised icons, they look a bit too pixelated to me.
